titleStmt.title: Durham, University Library, MS Mickleton and Spearman 27

history.provenance: Provenance: scribe of Bodl. Rawl. A. 389?; inscr. note in calendar, ‘Thomas Hawe anno quinto Edwardi iiii’, 15th c.; notice of arrest in Coventry, 1405; inscr. John Lightfoot, 17th c., f. i; gift of G. Wasey, to Bishop Cosin’s Library, 1817.

listBibl.bibl: Bibliography: MMBL, II, pp. 514–7; ‘Hawe, Thomas’ I–II, Baker, Men of Court, p. 839.

body.p:
Durham, University Library
MS Mickleton and Spearman 27. Calendar; Magna carta with statutes. ii + 124 + iii ff. 260 x 180 mm. Text block 175 x 115 mm.
Provenance: scribe of Bodl. Rawl. A. 389?; inscr. note in calendar, ‘Thomas Hawe anno quinto Edwardi iiii’, 15th c.; notice of arrest in Coventry, 1405; inscr. John Lightfoot, 17th c., f. i; gift of G. Wasey, to Bishop Cosin’s Library, 1817.
Bibliography: MMBL, II, pp. 514–7; ‘Hawe, Thomas’ I–II, Baker, Men of Court, p. 839.
